title: Next.js Canary Supports Partial Pre-Rendering for Faster Sites
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Currently, developers must choose between speed and functionality. Partial pre-rendering, an experimental feature in Next.js, may change that.
cntitle: Next.js Canary 支持部分预渲染，以实现更快的网站
cndescription: 目前，开发者必须在速度和功能之间进行选择。Next.js 中的一个实验性功能部分预渲染可能会改变这种情况。
